Title: Gotham Men's Silver-Tone Mechanical Pocket Watch with Desktop Stand # GWC1404...
Description: Gotham Men's Silver-Tone Mechanical Pocket Watch with Desktop Stand # GWC14048SB-ST FEATURES Classic and elegant silver-tone reproduction style 17 jewel mechanical pocket watch perfect for engraving Large polished 51mm case with scratch resistant mineral glass crystal Rich black ceramic dial with silver Arabic numerals and fancy hands Includes matching 14" curb pocket watch chain with spring ring attachment plus solid brass desk top stand Arrives in beautiful presentation box with Selvyt polishing cloth, lifetime limited warranty and operating instructions DESCRIPTION This classic and elegant reproduction style pocket watch from Gotham is the perfect addition to anyone's timepiece collection. Features include a highly polished silver-tone round case, black enamel dial with silver Arabic numbers and hands, precision 17 jewel hand wind mechanical movement and a scratch resistant mineral crystal to protect this beautiful timepiece. In addition, this watch includes a 14 inch curb chain that can attach to your belt loop plus a bonus solid brass desktop stand to display your timepiece when not worn. As always, your watch will arrive beautifully gift packaged and include operating instuctions, lifetime limited warranty and a Selvyt polishing cloth to keep your watch clean. This is truly a beautiful watch at a great price.
